sections.heading: 01|Acceptance of fees and employment by county recorder prohibited
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFNo county recorder or deputy, while in office, shall directly or indirectly accept any employment, or be interested in fee

sections.heading: 21, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be construed liberally for the purpose of effecting its general intent.
sections.text: 21, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be construed liberally for the purpose of effecting its general intent.
